params.recipient: address where the tokens where sent to.

params.loanID: The id of the loan being used.

TokensClaimed(address).notice: Notifies when the Escrow's tokens have been claimed.

claimTokens(uint256).notice: Sends the tokens owned by this escrow to the owner.
